sentences.sContent: The magazine carries an intriguing mixture of high fashion, gossip and racing.
sentences.sCn: 这本杂志内容丰富有趣，有关时尚、花边新闻和赛马的内容都有。

synos.tran: 引起…的兴趣；策划阴谋；私通（intrigue的ing形式）

remMethod.val: 来自intrigu (e) (激起…的兴趣) + ing → 引起兴趣的

words.tran: 阴谋；诡计；复杂的事；私通
[法] 密谋者，阴谋者；私通者
用诡计取得；激起...的兴趣

trans.tranOther: something that is intriguing is very interesting because it is strange, mysterious, or unexpected

trans.tranCn: 引起…的兴趣；策划阴谋；私通（intrigue的ing形式）
